title: JSON converter mapping file schema
description: The mapping instructions used for JSON to data model conversion.

submittables.description: The top level import instructions how to import the main JSON objects that map to the submittable classes, e.g. project, study, samples.

^.*$.description: An attribute of the object to be imported/generated.

type.description: The type of the output object, i.e. after conversion.

items.description: The type of item in the array list. Required if type is 'array'.

import.description: The import instructions for each specified mapping key.

^.*$.description: The mapping key to locate the right import rules, e.g. ae, hca.

path.description: The elements that need to be traversed to locate the target object to import.

method.description: The method the converter should apply to the target object.

from_type.description: The type of the target object to import, e.g. string, array, object.

translation.description: A dictionary to translate terms during conversion.
